text: Bimal Lakra (born 4 May 1980) is a former Indian field hockey player who played as a midfielder for national team. He was part of the team that won the silver medal at the 2002 Asian Games. Lakra's younger brother Birendra Lakra and younger sister Asunta Lakra have also represented India in field hockey. ==References== ==External links== *Player profile at Hockey India Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:People from Simdega district Category:Indian male field hockey players Category:Field hockey players from Jharkhand Category:Asian Games silver medalists for India Category:Asian Games medalists in field hockey Category:Field hockey players at the 2002 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2002 Asian Games
title: Bimal Lakra
